titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

body.p: There was a large congregation at 10 a.m. when I preached in the Abbey on the Responsibility of Privilege. The collection of the Children's Country Holiday Fund exceeded £41.
I preached again in the afternoon, & - although the weather had become rainy - there was again a large congregation. Offertory nearly £23.
